name: ioawn4t.zip
items: If On A Winter's Night, Four Travelers.sh

attr.title: If On A Winter's Night, Four Travelers
attr.desc: If On A Winter's Night, Four Travelers is a free narrative-driven point-and-click adventure that explores the stories of four different characters in a masked ball taking place on a train in the late 1920s.
attr.desc_md: If On A Winter's Night, Four Travelers is a narrative-driven point-and-click adventure with horror elements that tells the intertwined stories of four different characters in a masked ball taking place aboard a train in the late 1920s. The game features beautiful pixel art, atmospheric soundtrack, and emotionally engaging storytelling that has earned high praise from players.
attr.inst: Download the windows version of the game on Itch or Steam. Copy all assets, including the executable, into the gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md:
1. Download the Windows, Linux, or macOS version of the game from either:
   - [Itch.io](https://laurahunt.itch.io/if-on-a-winters-night-four-travelers) (Free)
   - [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1603980/) (Free)
2. Copy all game assets, including the executable, into the gamedata folder.
3. Launch the game using the PortMaster script.
